Scheduled Event Highlighting
Below you may define a scheduled date field that contains the day an event is scheduled for. On that day the event will be highlighted to draw attention to it and direct end users to enter data on the correct event.
Scheduled Date
Event

In-Window Event Highlighting
Similar to the above, you may define a start date field and end date field that that describe the valiid 'within window' period for an event. On those days the event will be highlighted to draw attention to it and direct end users to enter data on the correct event.
Start Range Date
End Range Date
Event

Event Group Tabs
Below you may define any number of tabs that group events together. The first tab will be the default shown when navigating to the Record Home page. If you'd like to ensure that data is only entered sequentially on tabs (e.g. each tab represents an opt-in trial by the subject) you can hide a group of tabs by specifing a text to use on the "Add tab" button (e.g. Start New Trial). You only should specify this text on the first tab of the group.
